title: When does work end?
creator_credit: Daphne Yarram, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Daphne Yarram gives a candid account of her life, helping the abused, poor and unfortunate in her community, trying to make things better for her mob. Despite feeling satisfaction helping her community, Yarram also feels lonely and tired at times.
creator_credit_for_label: Daphne Yarram, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
